scripts.test:api: cross-env API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080 npx codeceptjs run --steps --grep "DateTime API"
scripts.test:ui: npx codeceptjs run --steps --grep 'Date Time Checker|Datetime Checker'
scripts.test:e2e: npx codeceptjs run --steps --grep "E2E Date Time Checker"
scripts.test:mobile: cross-env MOBILE_BASE_URL=http://10.0.2.2:8080 npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.mobile.conf.js --steps
scripts.test:mobile:device: cross-env MOBILE_BASE_URL=http://192.168.1.65:8080 npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.mobile.conf.js --steps
